quotes.name: Audi
quotes.quote: With Monolith, we have a better understanding of our customer's behaviour which leads to a more optimised showroom in terms of layout and workforce.
quotes.credentials: Axel Geijtenbeek, Managing Director Audi Center Amsterdam
